items.question: What's your difference from OTAs?
items.answer: OTAs (Booking.com, Airbnb, etc.) charge 15-25% commission. We provide your own website and reservation system. You receive direct bookings, zero commission.

items.question: Do you only serve Antalya?
items.answer: We're the PlusPOS distributor for Antalya, but we provide web design and AI services nationwide. Remote support available everywhere.

items.question: Can I manage the site myself after delivery?
items.answer: Yes. We provide a simple admin panel. You can update content, photos, menus yourself. We also offer optional monthly support packages.

items.question: How does the AI chatbot work?
items.answer: The AI chatbot learns your business info and automatically answers customer questions 24/7. Supports Turkish and English, integrates with WhatsApp, your website, and social media.

items.question: Can I switch from PlusPOS to another system?
items.answer: PlusPOS is cloud-based and your data belongs to you. You can export and migrate anytime. We also offer data migration support.
